Posts.Content: momof1040 wrote: HI, I'M MOMOF1040. I have been told i have cancer. But had inductal papomila in left breast removed in may 2011. Then when i went back for my six mammogram they found another tumor deep in my left breast. they had to do a wire localization to get out. this happen on Sept of 2011. but since that surgery i had problem with my lymph been swollen. i have had nausea, sweats, chill and on march 13.2012 had all this plus a 102.9 fever.  all the doctor did was give antibiotic and pain med and a follow up appoint. i have really bad pain in my left shoulder that oncology says should have nothing to due with my lymph. so now i went back to my family doctor. he doing a MRI on my shoulder on wed, April 18,2012.   but no one seem to be able to give me a answer about why my lymph a staying swollen.  if anyone has had this problem could you please give me some advice.   i really worry because i was exposed to a insecticide that damage my lung. should i all so talk to my doctor about this.   i' m really at lost ends Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: reative lymph node left arm momof1040 Kicks
